scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace profiles start:dev" "yarn workspace users start:dev" "yarn workspace api-gateway start:dev" "yarn workspace frontend dev" "redis-server"
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn workspace profiles test" "yarn workspace users test" "yarn workspace api-gateway test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "yarn workspace profiles lint" "yarn workspace users lint" "yarn workspace api-gateway lint" "yarn workspace frontend lint"
scripts.build:backend: concurrently "yarn workspace profiles build" "yarn workspace users build" "yarn workspace api-gateway build"
scripts.start-backend:prod: concurrently "yarn workspace profiles start:prod" "yarn workspace users start:prod" "yarn workspace api-gateway start:prod" "redis-server"
